channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE Linux -- SMT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE Linux -- SMT

item.title: CVE-2018-12471|2024-09-17T01:50:45.119Z -- suse%20linux -- smt
item.description: A External Entity Reference ('XXE') vulnerability in SUSE Linux SMT allows remote attackers to read data from the server or cause DoS by referencing blocking elements. Affected releases are SUSE Linux SMT: versions prior to 3.0.37.
